text: log aap se sharaab aur joye ka masla pochte hai, aap kehdi jiye ke in duno mein bahuth bada gunaah hai, aur logo ko is se dunyaavi fayeda bhi hota hai, lekin un ka gunaah un ke nafa se bahuth zyaada hai, aap se ye bhi daryaafth48 karte hai ke kya kuch qarch kare? to aap keh dijiye ke haajath49 se zyaada cheez, Allah taâ€™ala isi tarah apne ehkaam saaf saaf tumhaare liye bayaan farma raha hai, ta ke tum sonch samajh sako
